DistinctiveFeatures: Wearing ragged leather armor, crouched in a sneaky posture, clutching weapons with gnarled hands.
Name: Goblin
PhysicalDescription: A small, green-skinned humanoid with pointed ears, sharp teeth, and yellow eyes. Goblins have wiry builds, stand about 3-4 feet tall, and move with jerky, furtive motions. Their facial features are harsh and angular, with oversized noses and bat-like ears.

DistinctiveFeatures: wearing mismatched leather armor, hooded cloak, bandana covering face, menacing stance with weapon drawn
Name: Bandit
PhysicalDescription: A rough-looking human with weathered features, standing 5-6 feet tall. Bandits wear practical leather armor often decorated with trophies from previous victims. They have hardened expressions, scarred faces, and carry themselves with the confidence of experienced fighters.

DistinctiveFeatures: alert ears perked forward, fangs bared in snarl, pack-hunting posture, piercing predatory gaze
Name: Wolf
PhysicalDescription: A medium beast with thick gray or brown fur, intelligent eyes, and powerful jaws. The wolf moves with predatory grace on four legs, standing about 3 feet at the shoulder. Its keen senses and pack mentality make it a formidable hunter.
